name: CLE - PCA Exclusive - 2023 60x6
additionalNotes: Widely known for full-bodied cigars, Christian Eiroa took a leap in the opposite direction with this mellow to medium-bodied beauty. Draped in a flawless Ecuador Connecticut wrapper, and chock full of aged long-fillers from Honduras, each CLE Connecticut dishes out a barrage of soothing flavor. Hints of roasted nuts, cream, leather, and a dash of spices enter the fray before a long crisp finish.
